website_summaries.verdict: Top-of-the-line, durable vest with storage for all industrial workers.
pros: Fully compliant with ANSI and ISEA 107 Class 2 Type R standards
Nine pockets in total to hold large and small items
Offers 360-degree reflectivity and high visibility for when you're in low-light conditions
Offered in adult and kids' sizes
cons: This is the most expensive vest on our list

customer_reviews.title: Pocket Heaven
customer_reviews.text: I wear a lot of leggings at my job so I don't have pockets. I wanted a vest that would hit low and had tons of pockets. This vest does both those things! Oh and I didn't want velcro closure! The zippers and other parts are plastic so they're metal detector safe. The pen pocket is my only complaint. It's not tall enough so pens fall right out. You have to put them in a pocket that closes.
customer_reviews.author: DaniH55

customer_reviews.title: Moves with his body BUT remember...
customer_reviews.text: My husband is a big guy and when he put this on he was so happy with it! All the pockets are great for his work as he works in the plants and has tools, pens, and paperwork with him all the time. It sits really nicely on him and he is able to move around without it moving too much. Great buy and a great size. Shipping was late but I must say it was packaged really well. I will get this again when he needs another one for work. **NOTE - Washes well BUT Do not use fabric softener and do not put it in the dryer**
customer_reviews.author: Love It Or Chuck it Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Very poor quality!
customer_reviews.text: One would assume that for the money, these things would hold together for more than a month! After 28 days, the reflective material is coming off, threads are coming loose and it’s falling apart! What a piece of junk, very disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Christopher G.

customer_reviews.title: I like this style safety vest so much
customer_reviews.text: Very very surprise for me! Many pockets is very convenient,large capacity of buckle pocket,zipper pocket and velcro pocket and so on. Never worry my things will be lost! High visibility refletive material and reflective packet sides, There is no doubt that this safety vest would increase your visibility in dark. I like this style safety vest so much!
customer_reviews.author: johnny

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: after wearing it for 2 days and now it's falling apart
customer_reviews.author: kimberly

customer_reviews.title: Great vest for an amazing price
customer_reviews.text: The vest works perfectly for what I needed. Added security when taking my dogs out for a walk in the early AM and late PM. Has enough pockets to comfortably fit my items while I walk and not be a distraction.One of the pockets fits a cell phone perfectly also. I also take OC spray and the right breast pocket holds it perfect and even has a small D ring that I can connect it to Only negative is I would like another one! Order a size bigger then what you think, I normally wear an XL but purchased the XXL and it fits perfect
customer_reviews.author: Reed C

customer_reviews.title: Loving it
customer_reviews.text: I received vest today and I'm really impressed. I'm a school crossing guard, I really didn't like the vest given to me by the district so I decided to get my own. LOL. It arrived quickly and with minor adjustments it fits perfect. Wear medium bought medium and it fits. It also looks great. The pockets come in handy.
customer_reviews.author: JLTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: Sizes are VERY small
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this TWICE. Ordered a size that I thought would be plenty. Nope. Could barely get on with lightweight shirt. Ordered the next size up which I thought would be huge. Nope. Same as the previous best, different label. Order 2 sizes above what you would normally, you might get lucky. One guy in our office who wears medium to large men’s shirts couldn’t get in an XL vest.
customer_reviews.author: Southern Patriot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent and Versatile
customer_reviews.text: This vest is extremely durable with a strong zipper. I am a 5”10” with a 38 waist and a 44 chest. The large size looks and fits like it was made for me. The extra pockets are very versatile and the vest is extremely visible under all adverse conditions. I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: N8860

customer_reviews.title: Great for Motorcycle Riders
customer_reviews.text: This is a great safety vest, I use it for motorcycle riding. I bought an L/XL and it fits about how I expected it to, a little loose around my riding jacket. The zipper is very robust and the pockets, which I didn’t expect to use, are actually very useful. I’ve noticed that I do seem to have better visibility on the road with this; since I commute in the early morning I thought it would be a good idea. Overall I’m really pleased with this!
customer_reviews.author: Gavin Garrison

customer_reviews.title: A good inVESTment
customer_reviews.text: I got a lot of compliments on this because it's not an obnoxious shade of pink but definitely hi-viz. I like all the pockets to hold things like my cell phone, tissues, etc. The sizing seems to be true to size. I ordered a large and it fit like any other large vest I have. It's not bulky or cumbersome. Good price I thought. I wore this on a construction project, but it was volunteer work, so it's not like I had to meet certain Osha regulations or anything, so depending on what you're getting this for just check the specs on it to make sure it fits whatever requirements you need. For me, it was perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Nichol

customer_reviews.title: Safety first
customer_reviews.text: I’ve been working in a food warehouse for 3 years that requires two inch reflective strips. Was tired of the orange and yellow! Super cute and cheap. I purchased the 2X for winter months since we have to have this on to and from the gate. Plus I like them bigger and not snug.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Givan

customer_reviews.title: Durable & very good quality at a VERY good price point.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest because it has LOTS of very useful pockets. The vest material seems durable and very good quality and because it is solid material and not net material I was able to affix some necessary patches (EMT & ARES) which I could not do with a net vest. Additionally, I have had the 'net' material vests before and they tend to snag and rip rather easily - especially those made in China. I definitely recommend this safety vest without reservation - if for nothing more than the pockets and the price..
customer_reviews.author: SeaRick

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: It looks great but unfortunately it was too small for me. I ordered a high visability vest from Amazon before and ordered and xl which fit me perfectly. When ordering this vest I ordered the same size xl but I can't even come close to zipping the vest up at all. I would probably need to go up at least 2 sizes. Kind of disappointed. Also for the short time I had it on it felt kinda warm. Not really ideal for me right now as it is already extremely hot at my job.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Figueroa

customer_reviews.title: I buy it again!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I work out side all day and night around aircraft at a bussy airport. Vest works for me stands out nicely in the dark, durable can cary many tools with these deep pockets with out worrying about a tool falling out. You can rewash the vest over and over for those who work in messy career field's.
customer_reviews.author: Bernabe Ray Lara

customer_reviews.title: Could be a lot better
customer_reviews.text: I am very happy with this product. Safety vests are usually the same color you will find orange and yellow the most. I am allowed to wear different colors where I work and it is not easy to find. I love the pockets the clear one in front is perfect for my badge it even can be scanned with my scanner witch is nice. The first day I wore it into work I was caught up by several ladies with how and where to get them one. It is excatly what it promised it is standing up to my job and I look good doing it.
customer_reviews.author: Jen

customer_reviews.title: Overall good product
customer_reviews.text: This is a pretty sturdy vest. Love all the pockets and see through pocket . comes in handy for me having to show my ID all the time. Ppl ask me ....... “where’d you get that vest from , I want one” . I tell ‘em “if I tell you I’d have to take you out. “ nice colors too. Wish they had a shirt to go with it. But one you won’t regret it. Oh yeah when ordering get you a size bigger. Seems like these run a little small. Overall good product.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Great Vest, but 3X is not 3X
customer_reviews.text: I bought this large (I'm already 2X) as it has to fit over a winter coat. Even without the coat, it's more like 2X in size. The materials, reflective tape, and manufacturing are all well done. I love the pockets and the clear-plastic ID badge pocket. It's well designed and thought-out. My radios (I'm a ham) will fit nicely in the pockets too. Too bad it (this orange color) does not come in a 4X or 5X size for us bigger emergency service workers.
customer_reviews.author: William Vaughn--Author, Mentor, Ham, Dad

customer_reviews.title: BRIGHT!
customer_reviews.text: Super visible and I love all the pockets! I’m riding an electric trike in traffic and want to be sure drivers can see me - if anybody can’t see me in this, they’d have to be blind! I’m normally a medium or 6/8 in women’s clothing and the medium is roomy on me - I should be able to wear it over a heavy coat in winter. (I wouldn’t size up unless you’re planning to always wear it over heavy clothing.) The pockets can securely hold everything I need - keys, wallet, phone, inhaler, you name it. Not noticeably hot. I won’t win any style awards, but I’m visible!
customer_reviews.author: K.A.

customer_reviews.title: Everything but the right sex
customer_reviews.text: Bought for cycling visibility. Light weight means cycling is a breeze, pun intended. Love all the pockets. Gives me a place to put my reading glasses that isn't hanging on my shirt under my throat waiting for a fall to puncture my trachea. Handy see-thru ID pocket is great if you need to display your ID or have it handy. Only knocked off one star because I got a women's (zipper on left, I can deal) and I don't see any sex selection on the order.
customer_reviews.author: Matronista

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with this vest, was the only one I found to suit me.
customer_reviews.text: I picked this vest for several reasons: it keeps its shape, it has a lot of pockets, one pocket is vinyl thus see-through, and it was a zipper. It is a bit smaller than I thought it would be but it fits over what I need it to. Being not of mesh material, it keeps its shape and looks more professional. I'm just using it to walk, but I didn't like the cheesy cheap and messy look of the mesh ones. The picture is accurate.
customer_reviews.author: zynzynviolin

customer_reviews.title: Helpful durable professional
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest. The pockets are perfect size. The zippers are terrific, I love having the clear pocket for my IDs and access badges. I’m a delivery driver and need pockets to hold work gloves, pens, ID badge, face mask, hand sanitizer, keys to the truck etc. It’s held up beautifully. I ordered a 2xL I usually wear an XL but ordered a little bigger thinking I could wear it over hoodies and jackets. It’s a little too tight with extra layers underneath but summer is coming so it’s still good to have. I am hoping that Amazon gets 3xL in pink (right now it’s out of stock).
customer_reviews.author: jessie

customer_reviews.title: VERY inaccurate sizing. LEFT side zipper pull
customer_reviews.text: I read the reviews, but STILL had a problem with fit. 3X always fits me fine with room to spare. Not so here. Tight around my belly, too short in length (like 1-2 inches above my belt line) and zipper pull is on the left. All seems to suggest this is a woman's cut 3x, though described as unisex.
customer_reviews.author: Tommy K.

customer_reviews.title: Love the pockets! Nice to have a ladies option in my size.
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this for emergency disaster relief work and volunteer construction work PPE. I normally wear a womens size 18/20. The XXL fits well enough to zip up with a T-shirt and jeans under. If I had bulky clothing on it wouldn't zip up, but would still fit. I like that the ID pocket is built in. ID is required for the projects I work with. I love the pockets! When not in use I keep my safety glasses in one of the lower pockets. I may get another one to put in my car just in case I have trouble while commuting.
customer_reviews.author: sandytoz

customer_reviews.title: Not for really hot weather.
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great when the weather isn't in the 90's it's not the most light weight vest but is very durable and the pockets are great. people ask me quite frequently where I got mine and I'll send them the link. I'm overall very happy with the vest.
customer_reviews.author: JordanUnicycle

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is not true. Go one size up more.
customer_reviews.text: Everything is great with this item, except fur two things. The sizing is not true USA fitting. Go one more size up for ensured fitting. I got lucky that it fits almost too perfectly. Any less would be a fail. The durability is moderate. Could be a tad bit more tough. Seems a bit warm to wear. Still comfortable enough to not complain and return it. The margin of dissatisfaction is so close to warrant a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel

customer_reviews.title: Get the Right Size
customer_reviews.text: My job offers safety vest for us that are marked 2x-3x and they fit over my layers comfortably. I ordered a 3x of this vest and it does not fit the same for me. With just a t-shirt it's an okay fit , still not a lot of wiggle room. Wearing a hoodie or layers underneath and I can't zip it comfortably. I suggest ordering a size or two up up. Also, the snaps on the pockets are plastic which have already broken. I wish that the clip holders were a bit longer to fit two glove clips. I can fit two clips but it's a tight fit and looked like carrying two clips could stretch the material.
customer_reviews.author: Shaleah B.

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: I've used one for over a year, gotten some for others and gotten a replacement one (after a year it's not looking great, and washing in cold water [the label has a 40° designation for European style washing machines, probably could get away with warm water wash]). I had a different brand that lasted maybe 6 months with the zipper breaking and so forth. Having bought like ten of these, I've only had one issue: with the latest one the snap on the right pocket was broken. Which is frankly not really even an issue.
customer_reviews.author: UniversityOfPi

customer_reviews.title: Far too SMALL
customer_reviews.text: I bought the XX-Large. Might fit snuggly on someone that wears a Large. Sending back for a refund. Otherwise quality was OK for the price. To get a 4X-Large (which is probably = to a XX-Large for real people) it costs $2.00 more, so I will purchase from another company. P.S. I wear XL Tee shirts that have plenty of room. Don't appreciate companies that try to cheat you when it is there fault!!!
customer_reviews.author: Dan

customer_reviews.title: Cheap but lots of pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I have had mine for a few months-ish. It has a lot of pockets, but the velcro pocket closures fall off and I've had to hold them on with staples. Also, the stitching comes loose and the material tears easily near the zipper. It's cheap and flimsy, but it's easily seen and you can carry a lot of stuff. May or may not buy another soon. Depends on if I can find a better quality one with a lot of pockets.
customer_reviews.author: James T Q 3

customer_reviews.title: All around superior value!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered an XL JK safety vest that arrived at my door today through Amazon Prime delivery. Ordered only two days ago this vest is an amazing value. I will be wearing mine over the Wisconsin summer months for bicycling safety although this vests uses are limitless. High quality sewing, quality fabrics and materials and features beyond my expectations. The manufacturer thought of everything including reflective piping, zipper closures and numerous pockets. I recommend ordering a size larger than you would normally wear especially if your intentions are to wear it over multi layers or a jacket. I would have expected this vest to cost much more. Fantastic! I love it and highly recommend this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: John Weber

customer_reviews.title: Good value, excellent appearance and fit.
customer_reviews.text: Very good vests. They fit nice and tight, so it doesn't look like you are wearing an garbage bag. Plus it's actual fabric, instead of that easily-torn mesh stuff. People assume I am the supervisor simply because I have a decent looking vest, rather than the rags everyone else wears. They aren't the world's highest quality vests (pocket buttons come off easily), but that means they aren't horribly expensive to replace if they get nasty. Only thing I didn't like was that the reflective strips aren't plastic-coated. Still a good value.
customer_reviews.author: SchmidtP71

customer_reviews.title: Nice but....
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite vest! I took one star away because it's not a true neon pink, its more peachy pink. The fit is great, its durable because I've washed it several times with no issues (air dry please if you purchase). I love all of the pockets too. Wish it was true pink to match with my pink work shoes. The photo shows this vest on the right and my other pink vest on the left
customer_reviews.author: Marie S.

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Functional!
customer_reviews.text: Love this vest! I work in a forestry office where we are standard-issued yellow vests but I wanted something more girly. It was very hard to find a vest in pink that meets safety standards so I was happy to find this. The price is good and the quality is also good. Fits very true to size.
customer_reviews.author: JMA

customer_reviews.title: Buyer BEWARE
customer_reviews.text: This vest seems to be just as stated in the description. The ONLY reason for 3 stars is that the black in pic is NOT the black of the vest that I received. The black on My vest looks like it was Already washed even though it is New with tags on. This is very Misleading and I probably would Not order again as I was wanting it to be as Black as in the pic. 😔
customer_reviews.author: Thomas - N.Y.

customer_reviews.title: Well-made, lots of pockets.
customer_reviews.text: Nice vest, much better than the basic ones sold at the big box home improvement stores. The XL is about the size of the 'one size fits most' that is sold at Home Depot. I bought both the XL and XXL sizes because I wanted a really huge one to wear over bulky coats and jackets, but there isn't a lot of difference between them.
customer_reviews.author: lotsamice

customer_reviews.title: Vest is falling apart !
customer_reviews.text: This vest has done nothing but fall apart at every pocket seam. I have to wear a pocketed vest for the job I do. The pen pockets do not even hold a standard pen. I am truly disappointed in the quality of this vest. I will be purchasing another vest from another company that will last. I bought this February 23rd and delivered the 25th and have worn it up until yesterday May 2. I have two other co workers who have the same exact vest and have the same issues on all the seams on the pockets
customer_reviews.author: Hank and Hoss

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy if you’ll need to wash
customer_reviews.text: Velcro wasn’t sewn properly, not attached on one side. After one wash the vest fell apart, stitches came undone, tab & loop seam came apart. Most positive thing I can say is it’s a cute pink...if you need something durable that will need washing pass on this vest!
customer_reviews.author: bsu555

customer_reviews.title: SIZE UP / Material is worth a couple months now
customer_reviews.text: The thread is coming out and it is not put together correct. It definitely not sizing right , I am usually a 1x , i sized up to wear underneath. Definitely no room to wear underneath. SIZE UP !!! Worth it if you want something now and want to purchase something better later. If that’s not you , buy the more expensive one NOW !!
customer_reviews.author: Bee Velasquez

customer_reviews.title: Pleased I bought this vest
customer_reviews.text: I bought this vest to wear at night when I go for walks. On mountain roads, lighting is poor and I want to be clearly visible. This vest does that very well. The pockets are roomy and convenient with lots of varying sizes so plenty of places to put bear spray, cell phone, flashlight, etc. Zipper works very well. Size was as advertised. and matched the picture.
customer_reviews.author: Allen

customer_reviews.title: Size matters
customer_reviews.text: I like the vest fine, and will use it, but....it's not 3X. I normally wear 2X shirts and jackets, and I bought this vest 3X to fit over a jacket. It does not. It fits me fine without a jacket, but I still need something bigger for use with a coat or jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Wayne Grantham

customer_reviews.title: Poor construction.
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking vest with reflective stripes. However, two concerns. 1. The zipper pull tab is on the left like they do on women's clothes, which makes for awkward zipping. 2. The zipper stitching separated from the fabric on the third use. Very cheaply made, and not worth purchasing. I would not recommend buying from this manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: F. Adamski

customer_reviews.title: 5 stars for quality
customer_reviews.text: Such good quality. The fabric is built to last. The reflectiveness is top notch and the color is exactly as pictured. All the pockets come in handy. A lot of reviews said it ran large which I guess you could say that. But these vests are designed to go over your clothing. I am a small in shirts so I purchased a medium and it fits perfectly over a another shirt, sweatshirt or jacket. I definitely wouldn't want it any smaller or it would fit too snuggley over my shirt(s). Overall, excellent purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth B.

customer_reviews.title: Fits as well as expected.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this one for a fellow worker as it's plainly visible at night and has plenty of very welcome pockets. Needs a better zipper. Sticks all too frequently. Otherwise quite excellent! (Footnote now several months later. Many washings later = Holds up well. Still excellent condition. Rubbed beeswax on zipper and it seems to be smoother with fewer 'sticks'. Still highly recommend.)
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product. Runs one size smaller.
customer_reviews.text: This is super nice. Feels great quality! LOVE all the pockets. They’re everywhere! However due to some other reviews that said they ran on the small side I ordered a size bigger. I usually wear a 3x so I ordered a 4x and an xl for my husband when he usually wears a large. They fit really well. Big enough that you can wear it over many layers during the winter but won’t be so huge in the summer. Perfect fit.
customer_reviews.author: April

customer_reviews.title: Good but this one is faulty...
customer_reviews.text: Item looks very good quality but when the zipper was rolled down, which was a struggle, one of the "teeth" came off and now it won't stay zipped up. I wanted to contact the seller instead of leaving a review, but here we are. Other than the faulty zipper, its a good vest but I would love for the seller to contact me.
customer_reviews.author: Isaac Tapia

customer_reviews.title: Safty Vest Is Highlighted
customer_reviews.text: You got Grego I did get the Highlight Safty Vest I went with 2x If I would of known I would of got 3X it does fit yet tight they are not ment to be Warm I would know mo on how it works out when I get on the job Friday I did Try it out Tight did Work However I bought the 3xl it Fits tiny bit loose I like it alot
customer_reviews.author: Gregory Kotlarczyk

customer_reviews.title: Pockets!
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I wore it to work yesterday and told everyone they must be colorblind because it was orange not pink ;) I love all of the useful pockets. I am so used to dropping my phone in bad places (the bilge) at work, which I need to have on me and can’t lose for fear of the company! I like the side pockets on the bottom as well so when I have the chance I have a place to put my hands and I don’t have to put them in awkward top access pockets like other vests. As long as no one drops a container on me, I’m going to call it good. Great vest!
customer_reviews.author: Serena WB

customer_reviews.title: Runs small. If you’re planning on wearing it over jackets etc....get a bigger size!
customer_reviews.text: It’s a nice vest for the price. I love all of the pockets. The bad part is it seems to run small. I ordered the XL in hopes to be able to wear it over a jacket/coat...the only wavy that can be done is by leaving it unzipped! Other than that, I like it!
customer_reviews.author: H. Ellis

customer_reviews.title: Not very durable
customer_reviews.text: I used this vest while I worked an amazon distribution center for prime orders. I would carry boxes and tote bags against my body. This vest fit very well and the pockets were great but after a couple of weeks I noticed some threads already beginning to come loose. I don’t think this vest would do well in a construction setting. It probably wouldn’t have lasted much longer while I worked with amazon, but I quit about a month after I got the vest so I’m not 100% sure, but still preeeeetty certain.
customer_reviews.author: Juan

customer_reviews.title: Inexpensive, plenty of pockets, good value
customer_reviews.text: This seems to be a pretty well made product. Only time will tell. It does get dirty easily, but hey it's on a construction site....lots of pockets and a clip for keys....I wish the clip was inside a side pocket though. There's a clear chest pocket for security badges, a pen/pencil pocket and it will hold your cell phone.
customer_reviews.author: Truthsayer

customer_reviews.title: I love this jacket with its multi pockets
customer_reviews.text: I love this jacket with its multi pockets. The material is light and breathable, and does not make you feel too sweaty. It's highly visible at night.The only reason I gave four stars is that J&K does not have it in other colors, such as black, blue or pink. I would buy more as gifts for friends and family if they did. The second reason is that the sizing is not true to size. The bottom seems to be narrowed to fit men's waist, not women.The sizing runs too small. I had to order a second one for a better fitting on a medium thick jacket. If J&K could make these improvements, this would be a superb jacket.
customer_reviews.author: Remakavo

customer_reviews.title: Very well thought out. Lots of useful pockets.
customer_reviews.text: I really like this vest. It has an ample amount of pockets that makes a job like mine much easier. My only complaint is it is considerably warmer than some other light weight safety vests out there but I still think this is the best one I’ve ever worn. Has a nice space to put your credentials if your job requires that.
customer_reviews.author: Dustin Riddle

customer_reviews.title: Velcro
customer_reviews.text: I really, really don't like velcro. This has it to close the pockets. It would be great if it came in smaller sizes too. That said I use it for gardening and walking in the country at night and it does the job. I took the velcro off so now the pockets can't be closed.
customer_reviews.author: E. HARRIS

customer_reviews.title: Just what I needed
customer_reviews.text: I took a position driving an Amazon route for a while. The flimsy vest that our route owner (not Amazon) gave us were embarrassing to wear, had no pockets and didn’t hold up to daily use. I found this on Amazon and absolutely loved the design with all the pockets. I ordered it and was very happy with the quality and appearance. The price was very reasonable. For anyone who needs a safety vest, this is a smart purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Nathaniel P.

customer_reviews.title: Practical and good build quality
customer_reviews.text: I've had this for 1.5 months so far. It replaced my work's old vest. This vest has great pockets to hold pens and hide them. Many compartments to hold ID badge, cellphones, wallets, condoms (just kidding), and a transparent pocket to show ID without taking out your card.. I've washed it once, and kinda half machine dry it and half hung to dry. It kept it size without any shrinkage using cold water. I would recommend this to someone who wants the convenience of pockets and not having their expensive pens taken by nearby coworkers that forget to give you your pen back.
customer_reviews.author: A. Macatula

customer_reviews.title: Pockets are no good, fitting is 1 size too small
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of these at separate times. Both of them looked good but don't last long. The stitching for the pockets just falls apart after about a week in half. I work in a shipping warehouse so not much heavy duty things to do. I only put a pair of gloves in them. Another thing is the size is 1 size too small.
customer_reviews.author: Matthew Puckett

customer_reviews.title: whata is with  the sippers on Amazon?
customer_reviews.text: First, it is heavy. secend, the pocket for the cell phone is very shinny plastic. third, hads weird pockeets not really needed. i just wantedx a vest with pokets tthis thing goes all out i was hoping for inner pockets as well. forth: tthe zipper is on the left! disapointed. but for someone who wantss to put there valubles in this and watcch them fall out. well. have fun.
customer_reviews.author: Hubbs

customer_reviews.title: Now this is a nice vest.
customer_reviews.text: Now this is a nice vest... great pockets everywhere and I have to carry around a lot of stuff. I will defiantly buy another one once I wear this one out. Well I wrote above about three weeks ago. My pocket Velcro came off one pocket and the other is halfway there and a snap on one pocket broke. Don't get me wrong everyone. I've had three or four of these and I just think this one was a defect or something. I already ordered another one because I do like this product. I do wish that they would put a stain resistant coating on these. I still give it a four star....
customer_reviews.author: bothedrummer

customer_reviews.title: very nice but way undersize - this garment runs at least ...
customer_reviews.text: Well made, very nice but way undersize - this garment runs at least 3 sizes smaller than expected. I'll be gifting this to my son and try to reorder another.
customer_reviews.author: Mombot1

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: Excellent quality. Holding up great after several washes with air drying. Husband wears XL shirt size and 33" waist pants size. Purchased size XL and it fits loose over regular clothes and still fits comfortably over several layers (2 shirts, 2 sweatshirts, and a jacket). Pockets are great for carrying tools, papers, and radio.
customer_reviews.author: DCshopper

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed with quality
customer_reviews.text: Very disappointed with this item. Bought for all the pockets/compartments. About a week after use, right pocket unsewed. Followed by top of pocket, then other side and so on. I bought this for work so I got it dirty and there are obvious signs of wear. It was hard to return because i need it for work and I haven’t found thread to match. Funny thing is that I work for amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Sizing just a little on the small side
customer_reviews.text: With shorter daylight, I wanted a High Vis vest for walking my dog in the neighborhood. It works well for the light duty I require from it, plenty of pockets for cell phone, dog treats, gloves, etc. The zipper is questionable, as if you run it up too high, the zip head comes off of the teeth, and in my opinion, the size is just a bit smaller than anticipated, but it's reasonably close. When it's time to buy another, I will look again to see what else is out there, but would buy this again if nothing else better gets my attention.
customer_reviews.author: Bee Farmer

customer_reviews.title: I recommend this product to anyone looking
customer_reviews.text: My wife walks early in the mornings, so I wanted her visible and safe. She loves this thing, enough pockets to hold all of her electronics that she thinks is necessary to carry around while she walks. definately keeps her visible in the dark, I recommend this product to anyone looking, you can't beat the quality or the price.
customer_reviews.author: Ron

customer_reviews.title: They run really small!!!
customer_reviews.text: First, the picture shows that you can customize it. Then when I messaged them about what I wanted on the back they said it was the wrong one and sent me the link to the correct item but it did not come in my size. The one I ordered I ordered a size too big and it is still too small. I like the quality and material but disappointed in the end.
customer_reviews.author: Big Daddy

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Wrong Side
customer_reviews.text: Even though this vest is just like the other 2 JK Safety vests I have purchased, the zipper is on the wrong side. It is Left-Hand zip instead of Right-Hand zip. It actually makes it difficult to zip up. Just because it is pink, doesn't necessarily mean that it should be for women. We have color-coding at work. It's not enough to return it, but it is annoying nonetheless.
customer_reviews.author: Tracy

customer_reviews.title: They are working great for our employees
customer_reviews.text: They are working great for our employees. we will be ordering more for sure from THIS VENDOR . They arrived very quickly. The only wish we have is for them to be made in XXXl and XXXXl - we have a couple big guys.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Size Smaller?
customer_reviews.text: I usually wear 3-4X. I ordered a 5X so I can wear this over my winter stuff at work. I work outside so I thought it was a good thing to get. It was marked as a 5X. But it fit like one of my smaller sizes. Won't do me any good in the winter. Gonna try and sell it to someone else. So, be careful of the size you order.
customer_reviews.author: Moses C.

customer_reviews.title: Good value, extremely handy!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my job that requires to wear a safety vest all day through the project. Saw this and the many pockets and clear ID pocket and seemed perfect! Ordered it and received it and was not disappointed! Fit me good, and all the pockets are useful for them to hold all my tool, and other items I need during my shift!
customer_reviews.author: Martin Nevarez

customer_reviews.title: Excellent safety vest, pockets are great.
customer_reviews.text: I like this vest, I really like all the pockets. I ride my bicycle every day and wear this vest for safety. It’s great for putting your iPhone in the top pocket and listening to podcasts as you paddle. Very happy with this vest. Good quality
customer_reviews.author: Dylan

customer_reviews.title: Runs really small
customer_reviews.text: This is sold as a 3XL and the label says 3XL but it fits like a standard Xl t-shirt. This brand runs really small with their sizes. Also the pen pocket is not big enough to hold a standard pen. Included is pictures of pen and pen pocket
customer_reviews.author: Sphen

customer_reviews.title: Good Quality
customer_reviews.text: Just received the vest. Appears to be well made. Have to test the reflective tonight. Order bigger size than you normally wear. Normal for me is xl. I ordered xxl. If i were wearing my bulkiest jacket...i would need a xxxl..this xxl is fine for wearing with a tee shirt or medium jacket. I took off one star because the zipper is reversed from normal. Meaning the slide part of the zipper is on the left side...this vest is reversed. Makes operation problematic. Shouldnt be any problem to use on my motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Schilling

customer_reviews.title: Good vest but not great
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great for my job, never in the way of anything fits true to its size, only downside is the sowing parts on the pocket are coming apart and the pockets are exposed stuff falls out
customer_reviews.author: Gabe Falcon

customer_reviews.title: I love all the pockets!
customer_reviews.text: I use this for work. Its light and I love the many pockets. Since I'm short I tend to rub the front of it on stations and picking totes rub the front of it also so some of the thread and fabric seems to be sorta peeling. Very durable tho! It's not unusable yet. Wish the pen pocket was longer for normal sized capped pens. They stick out too much.
customer_reviews.author: Jo

customer_reviews.title: What a deal these are
customer_reviews.text: Bought these to wear while patrolling our mobile home park. We love them! They are well constructed, have lots of pockets for our walkie talkies, pens, tissues, or whatever. You can see us coming from way down the street, and they look amazingly official. High recommend. Good value for the price. Generously cut.
customer_reviews.author: V. WELCH

customer_reviews.title: Small is too big
customer_reviews.text: I think I would have really liked this product if it fit. I love all the pockets and it seemed like it would be durable. I typically wear a woman’s 8-10. I ordered a small and I was swimming in it. Back it went.
customer_reviews.author: Bean

customer_reviews.title: Keep giving as gifts
customer_reviews.text: I like this vest and have received several complements so I purchased additional vests for gifts and also referred others to order. It is durable if it is washed less often than I have to. Mine has lasted about a year and is still wearable
customer_reviews.author: s elder

customer_reviews.title: Pockets fall apart easily
customer_reviews.text: Waste of money! Get what you pay for! One of the big pockets fell apart stitching came undone then started ripping and the small pocket where I put my bandages fell apart The Velcro came undone from the plastic pocket. wore it for work. I had to order a different vest Which is a mesh vest hoping next one is better then this junk vest.
customer_reviews.author: Joshua T. Moorehead

customer_reviews.title: True to size, good quality
customer_reviews.text: This vest is great! Fits pretty true to size, I usually wear a l-xl shirt depending on brand so I ordered a 2x vest to make sure I would have some extra room for wearing it over my coat and it fits like a 2x. An XL probably would've been perfect for me. I love all the pockets and how they're all zipper or Velcro closure.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Boss

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: This vest is a little shorter on me than I’d like, but it does the job. It’s held up pretty well aside from the binding on the sleeves and neck - I’ve been using this vest around three times per week and it has to be washed after each use, so I’d say it’s doing a pretty good job of holding up.
customer_reviews.author: EvP

customer_reviews.title: Great safety vest but clear plastic is brittle.
customer_reviews.text: I got this safety vest for the clear pocket to carry employee ID and license..the vest is very well make I would give it 5 stars, but the plastic on the pocket is brittle and cracked after using 2 months...I only wear it for 5 hours a day and it’s hung over my seat..
customer_reviews.author: Sharon

customer_reviews.title: Slim fit.
customer_reviews.text: I wear XL normally. This vest fits well feels good as long as I don't put items in the waist pockets when wearing a T-shirt. My 42 inch waist is the culprit but I'm ordering XXL so I can wear a sweatshirt beneath it in comfort. Zipper works easily. Edges are finished well, no scratches around neck.
customer_reviews.author: Pennsylvania Jack

customer_reviews.title: Functional & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: This vest is comfortable, lightweight, & durable. I bought a 2X since I normally wear an XL so it would fit well over my hoodie. I love all the pockets, some zippered, a hook for my car key, as well as the see thru badge window.
customer_reviews.author: Catherine Triggs

customer_reviews.title: Return not long enough
customer_reviews.text: This is a nice vest. I purchased in July 2020, return date was by August 2020. Today is October 2020. I Recently opened packaged 2 1/2 weeks ago worn probably Only 5 days and noticed it is coming apart where orange and yellow meet. Disappointed that it did not last for the amount of money. Wondering what can be done about it.
customer_reviews.author: Denise

customer_reviews.title: Seems to run a lot smaller than advertised
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 4X to make sure it would fit with heavy shirts or a jacket in the winter months. Turns out I can't even zip it up over a t-shirt. This is after wearing a 1X vest from Home Depot that fits and zips.
customer_reviews.author: H. Larsen

customer_reviews.title: Great safety vest!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that this High Visibility safety vest was so wonderful. The pockets are convenient now I won't "misplace" the items I use for work. I live in Texas and the material is very breathable its perfect for the hot weather. I do construction and it has lasted me longer than expected. The size is accurate and fits well. The zippers seem to be of great quality if you are looking for a High Vis vest I would definitely recommend this one give it a try!
customer_reviews.author: Abel V

customer_reviews.title: Side pockets a little flimsy, otherwise very good.
customer_reviews.text: Size info: I wear a women's 12 pants and the medium vest is just loose enough. Torso runs a bit long, but what can you do. After a month, it's holding up pretty well except the "open" pocket on one side. The weight of two iphones (a work phone and a personal phone) was a bit much, but it was a small tear. Pretty easy to patch and it's holding up well. I was looking for a lot of pockets and this delivered.
customer_reviews.author: Kori baij

customer_reviews.title: Amazon MDT2
customer_reviews.text: This vest is awesome! I definitely stood out and had people thinking I was a cop or leadership XD For reals tho, I previously worked at an Amazon where we’re required to wear reflective vests. I love the fact that I was able to hold more stuff that’ll help me through the day, but at the same time, I could look pretty good, dabbed it up with a star of life patch and still abide by the safety regulations. The only problem I have with it is that it only goes up to 2X and it runs a little tight but I managed. I recommend this vest if you need it!
customer_reviews.author: Danny Cruz

customer_reviews.title: I got mine a few inches larger than actual size because of the potential to get hung up.
customer_reviews.text: I just had a chance to give it a go Today. Sturdy. Didn't feel cheap. Pockets are good for TWIC and License. Reflective strip show up well at my truck terminal. One review alerted me to the pen slots and how they fall out and I concur. But.... I just slip the clip in the side of one of the deep pockets. Good product. I wanted a dark vest that won't show the smudges and grease that the orange vests continually pick up and show... Noticeably!
customer_reviews.author: Warren B.

customer_reviews.title: Great vest, poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: Loved this vest! Has lots of usable pockets for all sorts of stuff including 1 I use for my earplugs. , seemed to made of good material and met the safety needs on the job site However after less than 1 week the bottom right pocket started to separate and then nearly completely fallen off. Rather sad about a vest that is now useless after less than 1 week.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Preston

customer_reviews.title: size up
customer_reviews.text: My husband wears a 2Xl tall or a 3Xl in some brands of shirts. For this we ordered a 3XL and had to re-order a 4XL. It fits perfectly now, and he wears it often on the jobsite. I would recommend sizing up.
customer_reviews.author: happymom

customer_reviews.title: Decent vest.
customer_reviews.text: I think this vest is pretty decent. After a few months this vest is holding up pretty well. The buttoned pockets are terrible, they unsnap easily. The velcro pockets are really good they can hold somewhat heavy items with ease. In the night, this vest can be seen easily. Overall its a decent vest for the money. I just think the price is a little too much for what it is.
customer_reviews.author: JustMike

customer_reviews.title: Zipper head does not last & reflector frays
customer_reviews.text: Does not last long. The reflector lines fray. The zipper head falls off after one wash in the washing machine. I like it for its special color and is why I’m on my third one since zipper head fell off from the second one. Changing zipper head is more expensive than buying a new one
customer_reviews.author: Ify O

customer_reviews.title: Great vest, just got one with bad stitching.
customer_reviews.text: Really loved the vest! But my issue is that mine is already falling apart only after a couple months of use. The right pocket stitching has failed and is now almost coming completely off the vest itself.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony Lopez

customer_reviews.title: pockets rip
customer_reviews.text: After a few months, the pockets rip out on the left chest pocket side. I work for Amazon as a picker and it is physical but the wear and tear came from putting my phone in the pocket. Overall, the vest holds all my stuff, it's just the chest pockets that tear.
customer_reviews.author: Zach R. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Safety Vest
customer_reviews.text: This is the second one I've purchased. The first one, the zipper fell off the first week. This one, the top front left pocket came undone. These vests look great and should be great, but they're manufactured really bad. I can't believe a zipper would fall off much less the second one lasting just a week before something else happened. Do yourself a favor and buy another type, another brand and stay away from this P.O.S.
customer_reviews.author: Bob Biddle

customer_reviews.title: Well made, good fit
customer_reviews.text: This is a high-quality jacket at a fair price. It is just warm enough without being too hot at the end of one's walk/run. The zipper stuck at first but a bit of WD-40 cured that.
customer_reviews.author: Financier

customer_reviews.title: Does it’s job while looking good. Unlike those NEON vests u usually see in a Warehouse
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves it! Also said he got compliments on it all day at work... says it’s comfortable while serving it’s purpose with the placement of all the reflectors. Looks a lot better than those neon vests you usually see in a warehouse
customer_reviews.author: S.Paige

customer_reviews.title: Great lightweight but sturdy vest
customer_reviews.text: I use this for walking in the dark when I want to be seen because cars don't even stop in broad daylight at crosswalks. This vest has pockets for your camera, water bottle, keys, gloves, snacks and everything, so no need for a backpack.
customer_reviews.author: Janmo

customer_reviews.title: does last not durable
customer_reviews.text: this vest is not durable at all. it last like a month. hardly and then it starts ripping apart.
customer_reviews.author: dan

product_meta.title: JKSafety 9 Pockets Class 2 High Visibility Zipper Front Safety Vest With Reflective Strips, Yellow Meets ANSI/ISEA Standards (Large)
feature_bullets: MATERIALS: 100% Polyester H-Vis Reflective Material, Durable, Breathable, Lightweight and Machine Washable. Customers who prefer a Loose Fit should order next 1-2 sizes up. Please check the size chart before placing the order!

HIGH VISIBILITY AND 360° REFLECTIVITY: Neon Yellow safety vest is high visibility with two-inch wide reflective strips cover the waist, chest, shoulders and back which provide 360°protection while you are working under daylight or low light conditions.
9 MULTI-FUNCTION POCKETS DESIGNED: This Safety Vest comes with 9 Front Pockets with Zipper Velcro clamshell closure for easy access. Enough space for cell phone, flashlight, and laser pointer.

INDUSTRIAL APPLICATIONS: Multiple Applications for Municipal Workers, Constructions, Contractors, Renovation Professionals, Engineers, Surveyors, Forestry, Warehouse Personnel, Securities, Parking Attendants, Public Safety Officers, Airport Ground Crews, Crossing Safety Guard, Cycling, Wildness Hiking, Park Walking, Jogging, Motor Riding, or Volunteering.
CERTIFICATIONS: Full compliance with ANSI/ISEA 107 Class 2 Type R. Any Imperfection are guarantee for Full Refund or Exchanged. Risk-Free! ADD TO CART NOW

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.6 out of 5 stars4,759 ratings4.6 out of 5 stars
